<html><div style='background-color:'><DIV class=RTE>
<P>Basically was my idea in point 2 and also as intruduce storylines that keeps interest in RPGers that lead Unircon's rrival. The purpose of this ideas born 'cause I saw sadly how this RPG was loosing members and interest and I like this RPG.</P>
<P>I'm not so good as moderator as I wished to be. :( SOrry due that</P></DIV>
<DIV></DIV>>From: Polar Claw <CYCODRONE@...>
<DIV></DIV>>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
<DIV></DIV>>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
<DIV></DIV>>Subject: Re: OOC: Decisions ((Nic)) --> Polar, Jerame, everybody else too 
<DIV></DIV>>Date: Sat, 14 Feb 2004 21:31:34 +1100 (EST) 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>I can't believe that you'd take a rediculous take on 
<DIV></DIV>>this Nic. I mean this is something that is established 
<DIV></DIV>>in Cannon and to much greater extents in both distance 
<DIV></DIV>>and mass than what's happened here. I honestly thought 
<DIV></DIV>>this group would actually use common sense with 
<DIV></DIV>>RPGing, rather than taking the attitude of 'cause the 
<DIV></DIV>>rules say so. I'm sorry but I can't play in an RPG 
<DIV></DIV>>where the rules give way to common sense, which in my 
<DIV></DIV>>opinion is the same bad gming that resulted in a 
<DIV></DIV>>massive adendum in the REF Field Guide sourcebook for 
<DIV></DIV>>the robotech rpg because people were using a total 
<DIV></DIV>>lack of common sense with things like regular humans 
<DIV></DIV>>versus explosives  where a player under the rules 
<DIV></DIV>>could brush off an explosion at point blank range by 
<DIV></DIV>>using their sdc or physical resistance to damage.  I'm 
<DIV></DIV>>sorry, but I'm not gonna play in an RPG where common 
<DIV></DIV>>sense plays second fiddle to the rules rather than 
<DIV></DIV>>underlying them.  I'm outta here. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>  --- Nic <PROUDWING500K@...>wrote: 
<DIV></DIV>>--------------------------------- 
<DIV></DIV>>1) Teleportation is allowed as an introduction only. 
<DIV></DIV>>Primus may be 
<DIV></DIV>>in there, but it still is banned by the rules. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>2) The idea to bring Unicron has the objetive to make 
<DIV></DIV>>intersting RPG 
<DIV></DIV>>experiences. To reach that objetive, current chars 
<DIV></DIV>>have to develop 
<DIV></DIV>>their weapons and skills in order to defat him... 
<DIV></DIV>>Impossilbe??? Not 
<DIV></DIV>>so.  Remember when the aparently weak defeats the 
<DIV></DIV>>mighty Minions. 
<DIV></DIV>>They're NPCs, so we'll make it possible the way it is. 
<DIV></DIV>>The solar 
<DIV></DIV>>flare idea ruins that because it threatens Earth and 
<DIV></DIV>>simply gets to 
<DIV></DIV>>kill Unicron in one shot. Killing him like this ruins 
<DIV></DIV>>the whole 
<DIV></DIV>>point and the fun of the game. Try something else that 
<DIV></DIV>>will allow 
<DIV></DIV>>everyone to get through the battle. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>If you want to tell us of your concept in order to 
<DIV></DIV>>make it more 
<DIV></DIV>>legal (speaking to everyone), you're welcome. 
<DIV></DIV>> 
<DIV></DIV>>
